text: ( Photo : Youtube ) Nearly 20 years later and Britney Spears proves she can still rock the sexy schoolgirl look. In an Instagram video the popstar shared with her followers, she models a variety of outfits including the famous schoolgirl uniform from her 1998 song “ Baby One More Time. ” The star is proof that age is only a number as she showed off her rock hard abs while strutting for the camera — minus the pigtail braids.
